name: Your own SMASH T Shirt!
description:
You've seen the original, now get your OWN!

One of the main reasons we set this little shop up is because we realised family drama and trauma is at once both a personal and universal thing. By creating your own SMASH t shirt you can create little pockets of support.

Buy one or buy a million, how you decide to  smack down negativity and promote love and support to your friends and family is up to you. But we think an awesomely logo'd T Shirt praising the awesomeness of those you love dear is a good way to start. 

It brings people together. It makes strangers confused. It encourages badassery.

To order a custom SMASH t shirt, just pick your colour and size from below, and then after you've ordered contact us using the contact form on the right, the name of the person you want to promote with SMASH rage and love.

e.g. select Custom White T shirt (S) 
then contact us with [insert person's name] SMASH. 

And remember! 10% of profits go to Relate- the charity that offers counselling for those affected by divorce!

SMASH HATE, SPREAD LOVE! <3

Happy smashing :)

name: The Original TINA SMASH T Shirt
description:
The one that started it all! The original TINA SMASH t shirt. Designed  and worn by the Balchin Sisters as a direct response to supporting their mother through her divorce in awesome style.

Plain White T Shirt with massive green letters in Impact font saying TINA SMASH on front. SMASH HATE, SPREAD LOVE slogan on the back :)

Order this one and be part of the TINA SMASH phenomenon. Make people wonder why the hell it's on your t shirt.

And remember! 10% of profits with be donated to Relate- the charity that offers support for those affected by divorce!

SMASH HATE, SPREAD LOVE! <3

Happy smashing!
